---
title: "Potential Utility Functions"
---

List of utility functions that would be useful in a package:

-   automatically plot 2 variables in a scatter plot <br>
-   quick data summary of a data frame, including \# of missing values, range of values, basic statistics. <br>
-   Correlation matrix plotter <br>
-   Categorical Data encoder <br>
-   Simple linear regression diagnostic <br>
-   Data exporter <br>
-   Table Generator using kable <br>
